levels.description:
Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as <@ba.rem>Arts damage</> to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> targets within range, and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun:0.0}</> second(s)
<@ba.rem>Can store up to 3 charges</>
